name: Family2D-PC-games
description:
First of all, thank you for download and play my game. This is my very 1st unity project, create for studing and try out my ability to see if I suit for this job. By playing, you will see a lot of material like image, music... i put in the game is from another game..., those material isn't mine, except for the code i wrote.  

I will put this game free for all, enjoy playing with your friends and family, this game supports up to 4 players, auto accept any gamepad, or you can custom config using keyboard, but i recomment using gamepad.  

There is no tutorial for now, try out playing yourself, it's just some classic games. I might be upload some youtube tutorial video later .

The game is texted a lot , but there maybe still some minor bug, you can send bug report to my email .

Main goal i made this game, is for family to play together and have fun.

Enjoy , may God bless U. (sorry for my bad English )
